document_data.name: the Choir
document_data.mainbody: '''The Choir''' was a cult of [[aberration|aberrations]] based in [[Akanûl]] who worshiped a [[spellplague|plaguechanged]] [[sirine]] they called the [[Blue Lady]].
document_data.Members: Members of the Choir had the ability to influence others through their strange songs.  The Choir used wolf-like spellplague changed creatures known as [[Oenath|Oenaths]] to track prey in the wilds.
document_data.Activities: In [[1479 DR]] members of the cult traveled to [[Airspur]] where they recruited a number of Airspur's residents.  Those who didn't travel back to [[Tohrepur]] with the Choir were kidnapped.  The Choir was disbanded in 1479 DR when a small group of adventurers led by [[Uthalion]] traveled to the cult's shrine in Tohrepur and killed the Choir's leader, [[Khault|Lord Khault]].
